title: (37700) Béjar - Carretera Castañar
description: Parking near a Spanish picnic park. Source of drinking water. The parking is small and it overlooks the valley. Watch out for busy times (during the day at weekends).

title: (37700) Béjar - Calle de los Derechos Humanos
title_short: (37700) Béjar - Calle de los Derechos Humanos
description: Many people during the day. Dirty toilet at the extreme fountain without too much pressure so you have to take your time for the full of water.

title: (37700) Béjar - 5 Carretera Castañar
description: Parking next to some rural houses, quiet place

title: (37700) Béjar - 10 El Castañar
description: Very nice spot. Very calm. Nice night. Nice view of Béjar.

title: (37700) Béjar - 1 Calle los Magnolios
description: Under several giant chestnut trees with a lot of SHADOW. Ideal to rest from the summer heat.

title: (37700) Béjar - 2 Plaza de Santa Teresa
description: Free parking at a park, without services. But very quiet. Supermarkets and petrol station are very close. For small vehicle.

title: (37700) Béjar - Calle Fuentehonda
description: It is an area that is right where the Vía Verde de Béjar leaves. There is a bar in the same station, a burger type and a bar-restaurant opposite. It is mixed, although the ac usually stop at the parking lot crossing the Vía Verde as it is quieter and cars do not usually pass there.

title: (37700) Béjar - 42C Carretera de la Estación
description: Via Verde de Béjar (Salamanca). The most beautiful parking in town to spend the night, overlooking the wall. Quiet, clean water, garbage, solid ground and well leveled ground. Interesting village of the Textile business in the past.

title: (37700) Béjar - 6-8 Calle Gibraleón
description: Very quiet street to spend the day or the night, you can park on both sides of the street, around the park and gardens, supermarkets, pharmacies, bars, etc. within 200 m, easy access.

title: (37700) Béjar - 35 Calle Recreo
description: Self service laundry. Clean modern laundry with 3 machines (one xxl) and 2 dryers. Opening Hours 08:00-22:00. Plenty of free street parking outside.

title: (37700) Béjar - 9 Calle Víctimas del Terrorismo
description: Parking, part of land and part of asphalt, quiet, without disturbing neighbors. Little traffic, only the city bus passes. Going down, passing through a DIA supermarket and crossing a river bridge, you quickly reach the lower part of Central Park, where the tourist office is located.

title: (37700) Béjar - 69 Calle Recreo
description: Playground area at the exit of Béjar. Nearby there is a Mercadona and restaurants. A Repsol gas station is also 100 meters away.

title: (37700) Béjar -
description: Alternative to the spot above. Little frequented, a few hunters at the weekend.

title: (37700) Béjar - Camino de la Peña de la Cruz
title_short: (37700) Béjar - Camino de la Peña de la Cruz
description: Peña De la Cruz Access by a road to Peña Negra. It's hard to find someone up there. Beautiful views of the whole sierra and Bejar. There is a restaurant right next door but when I was it was closed. In winter eye because it blows the air.

address.street: Camino de la Peña de la Cruz

title: (37710) Candelario - Paseo de Miguel de Unamuno
title_short: (37710) Candelario - Paseo de Miguel de Unamuno
description: Parking of municipal swimming pools, very quiet

title: (37710) Candelario - 4 Calle Eras
description: Public parking in one of the most beautiful cities of Spain. Peaceful place.

title: (37710) Candelario - 6 Calle S.A.U.8
description: Free day and night parking. No services Less difficult to access than the one higher up in the forest

name: Camping Cinco Castaños

description: Small campsite on a slope with lots of shade

title: (37710) Candelario - CC-16.3
description: Picnic in the Sierra de Bejar in full pine forest, has barbecues prepared to prevent fires, can be used in summer, enough tables, views of Bejar and its mountains.

title: (37710) Candelario -
description: Perfect place if what you are looking for is tranquility, especially when the picnic area is full of people with loud music as it happened to us. From the picnic area there is a path that goes into the pine forest. There comes a time when the road opens up a bit and there is space to park a vehicle. If you need water you can take it from the picnic area.

title: (37716) Cantagallo - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (37716) Cantagallo - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Rest area, is a bit ugly and just for staying overnight.

title: (37700) Béjar -
description: Parking area next to the road with views of the reservoir. Quiet area although it is next to the road, it is little traveled. On the other side of the road, the forest offers us a stream of water. We have spent a very pleasant night with magnificent views. The only downside is that there is very poor coverage

title: (37710) Candelario - CC-16.3
description: Rest and bathing area in the River Body of Man. Also climbing area. Surrounded by oak trees. It is indicated with a sign as La Dehesa Nature Classroom. There is space to park AC. The road to get there is narrow.

title: (37710) Candelario - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the first platform of the Sierra de Béjar, perfect for mountain roads. There is a mountain refuge hotel with bar, restaurant, etc. The access road is a mountain road in good condition.

title: (37717) Vallejera de Riofrío - 1 Calle Eras
description: In Vallejera de Ríofrio. Abandoned soccer field. With drinking water without connection to hoses. Quads Adventure.

title: (10759) La Garganta -
description: Small spot on the edge of the road with very little traffic Forest on one side, sheepfold on the other Viewpoint over the lake below and over the valley Near climbing spot El Puertecito - La Muela We have a good night, with quite a bit of wind, woke up in the clouds but it quickly cleared up in the morning ✌

title: (37710) Candelario - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the second platform of the Sierra de Béjar at almost 2000 meters above sea level. The access road is in good condition but is dangerous due to the possibility of ice and snow. In winter it is usually closed. From there, several hikes begin and there are climbing and ice areas nearby. The parking lot is on the ground.

title: (10759) La Garganta - CC-16.3
description: Corral de los Lobos, a very beautiful place between the Garganta and Candelario in the mountains, has a water fountain and a table with benches, we have not done night but I am sure it is a perfect place to rest and enjoy a starry sky. There is some inclination but it is quite slight.

title: (37716) La Hoya - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice location (June 2017) quiet and starting hiking trails. Small stream below.

title: (37716) La Hoya - 1 Diseminado Covatilla
description: Parking at the Sierra de Béjar ski resort - la Covatilla. facilities include cafeteria, shop, rental services, wc, ski school ... when open.

title: (37716) La Hoya - DSA-180
description: Location not very long of the previous one. Further away from the road. Quiet place

title: (10759) La Garganta - CC-16.3
description: Parking area to visit the snow well. There is a well marked trail. The parking area is level and suitable for AC. Narrow road. From there we have walked to the hermitage of San Gregorio. A spectacular landscape. Also from there we have walked about 1.5km to the town La Garganta where the Iberian Wolf Interpretation Center is located. In town, difficult to park AC.

title: (37775) Salamanca - N-630
description: Fuente del Cántaro: abundant drinking water, adjoining parking...

title: (37720) Puerto de Béjar - 57 Carretera Salamanca
description: Perfect place for a break on the Ruta de la Plata highway, it is next to a road with very little traffic.

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: It is a small area that truckers use to rest, there are also usually motorhomes, ideal to stop for lunch and continue on your way.

title: (37727) Montemayor del Río - Calle Traspalacio, 2
description: Parking lot of the castle, narrow entrance, and with rope type "galibo" for a vine of a civilian. Level, quiet, and close to the castle. Be careful not to wander around with motorhomes. Perfect to spend the night, to visit the town to stay a little lower-

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Calle Callejón
description: Free parking area and machine for pouring gray and black water. Next to the sports center and swimming pool. When open, possibility to use the showers and bathrooms. A five minute walk from the town center. Calm and quiet place. Beside the road.

title: (37777) Sorihuela - 53 Calle Ermita
description: A green area around a hermitage ... very flat and very quiet

title: (37727) Montemayor del Río - Camino Fuente Vieja
title_short: (37727) Montemayor del Río - Camino Fuente Vieja
description: Parking very quiet and easy to access to see the castle and the city, it is just below the castle. They enter about 6 -7 AC. the castle is fairytale

title: (37727) Montemayor del Río - 1 Calle Traspalacio
description: A place from a movie, campervan next to a castle, do not go up where it says parking of the castle since it is narrow, take the deviation that leaves to the left and that crosses the town, but that site is wide. You cannot enter the parking area with a camper because it is planted a vine from one side of the street to the other in order to limit that caravans do not enter.

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - CC-V-16
description: Former station, now a belvedere.

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - CC-16.2
description: Old railway station, enabled as a greenway. I have space to park and stay overnight. It has a picnic area with stone tables and a playground. The views are beautiful. It's a peaceful place.

title: (05610) Becedas - 26 Carretera Tremedal
description: Beautiful public parking in the middle of nature for 2 motorhomes. Nearby there is a natural pool and a reservoir. The pool is open in summer. There are no services. Slight incline.

title: (37727) Montemayor del Río - 14 Calle Ermita
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Spot at the edge of a lake bordered by hills, quiet and little frequented (fishermen and walkers), magnificent point of view. Accessible by a practicable dirt road for about 1km. To be left of course clean after departure. Nature is the priority

title: (05691) Solana de Ávila - 1 Calle Chinarral
description: Picnic area and main car park of the Tremedal village. It has a spring of untreated water, some tables and swings for children. Please do not park near the fountain as there are animals that come to drink. Please keep the site clean. There are many hiking trails around and some lagoon. Narrow road but enough for motorhomes.

title: (05691) El Tremedal - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place at the top of the tremedal port

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor -
description: Ideal for an overnight stop if you are on the A66 route. Quiet site for one vehicle only. Access is by dirt track, somewhat uncomfortable but practicable without problem.

title: (10700) Hervás - 25 Calle Trasera de Diego
description: Several places along the road with quick access to visit the old town and the beautiful Jewish quarter of Hervas.

name: Camping Las Canadas
title: (10700) Camping Las Canadas
description: Impeccable reception and structures. This campsite is not designed for motorhomes, trees, in abundance, prevent the installation. No wifi. Impossible to receive TV because of the trees. The site is beautiful, all the facilities are super clean.

title: (37684) Cristóbal - 13 Carretera Bejar C-515
description: Quiet place to spend the night if you go to the pool or sierra de Francia, with a mountain bike center and mountain bike routes

title: (10700) Hervás - 10 Paseo Extremadura
description: Plenty of day and night parking, ideal for exploring the town, which is worth a walk through its streets and enjoying its gastronomy.

title: (10700) Hervás - 2 Calle Los Barrancos
description: Parking next to the cemetery very quiet ideal for visiting the city or spend the night

title: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (10750) Baños de Montemayor - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Super quiet, only the motorway could disturb noise-sensitive people. Spent an afternoon and night here, swimming in the lake.

title: (10700) Hervás - 8 Calle la Vía
description: Esplanade between the museum and the hostel. Recommended by hostel owners. You can take a shower at the hostel for 3 euros, rent bicycles to do the greenway of La Plata. 5 minutes from the center of town walking, without shade during the day

title: (10700) Hervás - 11 Paraje la Estación
description: Quiet and quiet place within a large private garden. Very large vehicles do not fit. Possibility of shower, light socket, swimming pool. Free WIFI.

title: (10700) Hervás - 22 Paseo Extremadura
description: Leveled concrete street, recommended by people from the area to spend the night. Both on this street and the one that continued, there were several Motorhomes. Municipal pool from 11:45 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. where you can eat cheaply. Very lively park with good mountain views.

title: (10700) Hervás - 21 Avenida de la Reconquista
description: Hervás, Av. De la Reconquista. Before reaching the roundabout, turn right, next to it there are several containers. There is space for approximately 3 Acs. Next to town and the playground. Ideal for stopping or overnight. Flat area. Location with a lot of noise for the night on the side of the road a lot of car traffic

title: (10700) Hervás - 49 Avenida Piñuelas
description: Site for up to 5 motorhomes approximately. There is a road next to it and there is noise. Next to the greenway.

title: (10700) Hervás - N-630
description: Access: when the campsite is on your right, take the road just after on the right, continue until you cross, cross the bridge on the left and the car park is on the right. Almost at the edge of the water, there is a little passage but not noisy, people park to go for a walk, some swimmers. There are some quieter spots in the nearby paths.

title: (10700) Hervás - Unnamed Road
description: Industrial area freshly developed, but not used ... Completely empty with many parking spots. Some diagonally, but to the lake just. No disposal, no trash, nothing. But perfect to spend a night on the A66! The police passed and tolerated us.

title: (10700) Hervás - 5 Calle Juan Ramón Jiménez
description: Quiet quarter of terraced houses at the entrance of Hervás right, direction Sports Centre.

title: (10700) Hervás - 27 Avenida Francisco Sanz López
description: Small esplanade perfect for various motorhomes and vans. There were several cars parked and we still had plenty of room. You can spend the night, being a quiet area. Well communicated with the city. Hiking trails begin.

title: (10700) Hervás -
description: Peaceful, even with the freeway above. waking up to the sound of cowbells.

title: (10700) Cáceres - N-630
description: A good place to spend the night, with easy access to the shore of the reservoir and with more motorhomes around

title: (10611) Tornavacas - N-110
description: Parking in the middle of nature, quite flat. No services. Very quiet night. Shaded picnic tables.

title: (10700) Hervás - 22 Calle Pedregoso
description: Nice place near the arena in Hervas. In Hervas you can see the Jewish Quarter, the Museum of Motorcycles, Crafts and Sculpture. Pedal strollers can be hired to circulate on the old railway line.

name: Camping El Pinajarro
title: (10700) Camping El Pinajarro
description: Camping El Pinajarro, family camping with a lot of shade and plot, with swimming pool, cafeteria, playground, barbecues and in summer entertainment and restaurant. They accept pets and is ideal for couples and families!

title: (37773) La Cabeza de Béjar - DSA-170
description: Roadside, little passage ideal for one night.

title: (37773) La Cabeza de Béjar - 10 Calle San Roque
title_short: (37773) La Cabeza de Béjar - 10 Calle San Roque
description: Very quiet town. The ground is of earth. It is next to a very beautiful Chapel. There is a pylon where you can catch water. You can drink without problems. Ideal to spend the night. In front is the village bar and a playground

title: (10611) Tornavacas - 96 Humilladero Pl-4
description: Tornavacas - next to the river and the municipal swimming pool. Maybe when the pool is open (summer), parking is not possible. Concreted and with rubbish bins next to it. The town is worth a visit. And the setting is spectacular.

title: (10612) Jerte - N-110
description: Rest area with some tables and some shade.

title: (10612) Jerte - Carretera Ávila
description: Parking for 2 or 3 cars with a table. beautiful viewpoint. we spent the night 2 cars. not much shade. surrounded by cherry trees

title: (10611) Tornavacas -
description: Mirador de la Cruz, from where you can see the whole Jerte Valley and which is less crowded than others because it is not a transit point, you have to look by the side of the road and ask where you can get to (otherwise you will come out of the area), access for vans and small mobile homes, cement roads, cement road mostly paved and in good condition, then 1 km without pavement, you get to the viewpoint, there is also a shelter and tables in the corner, place of pilgrimage for local people, place with Shade and there is a water source, you will see it before you arrive, I slept there without any problems, I think there will be no problem with sleeping in the season because of the location and the number of places

title: (10700) Hervás - N-630
description: At the edge of a lake at the end of a small path lined with stone, a haven of peace. Only downside the highway goes a little higher, but not much noise. Amateur fishing, you will be filled. Pure place to leave obviously clean after your departure. Thank you for nature!

title: (10612) Jerte - N-110
description: Shady place, surrounded by nature, there are more places along the track, take a walk Before, it is close to the national road, but on the other side of the valley, river nearby, you have to cross a small 3/4m bridge, wide, look carefully before crossing, there is an abandoned fish farm nearby to the left as you go up, along the track, ideal if you go with dogs and want to let them loose, you would be on a track the people who pass by are very friendly, at least my experience , I spent the night, without camping, without problem

title: (05693) Gil-García - Unnamed Road
description: Cold water source to fill carafes! Difficult tap to connect a hose. Right off the N110. It is at the entrance to the town of Puerto Castilla, not in the direction you mark here.

title: (10612) Jerte - 21-19 Calle de la Tahona
description: Flat site for vans !! With shade and next to the river, road in good condition, ideal if you like tranquility !!

title: (05693) Casas del Abad -
description: Beautiful location to spend the night, in the middle of nature

title: (10740) Aldeanueva del Camino - 29 Carretera N-630

name: Camping Roma

description: Camping with good location camping, fairly flat and shadows, but without camper service and low trees. Œil with low trees and its many branches.

title: (05693) La Venta - 38 Calle Real
description: Quiet area to spend the night or day, riverside picnic, fountains, soccer fields and basketball on site.

title: (10612) Jerte - 57 Avenida Ramón y Cajal
description: Water fountain, is right next to the tourist office, and next to the road, perfect for a water recharge and get information about the area!

title: (10612) Jerte - 23-53 N-110
description: Roadsides in the city for one night is not bad. Next to the Giardia Civil and the Tourist Office and opposite the health center.

title: (10612) Jerte - 22 Calle Fuente Nueva
description: Parking in the town, Right next to a children's park and the Jerte River. Wonderful views.

title: (10612) Jerte - 1 Calle las Eras

title: (10740) Aldeanueva del Camino - 8 N-630
description: Service area Large parking area for trucks. Carrefour express Cafeteria and bar and 24-hour gas station Very close to the motorway.

title: (10612) Jerte - 4 Calle la Nogalea
description: Perfect but beware, only pickups discreetly, hiking and btt trekking for children, chiringuito and fountain

title: (37740) Santibáñez de Béjar - 11 Barrio Cabezuelo
description: Parking high area of the town. Possible to park and spend the night. There is a bar nearby and the town has grocery stores, drugstore, bakery.

title: (37768) Los Santos - 62 Calle Sierra de Francia
title_short: (37768) Los Santos - 62 Calle Sierra de Francia
description: Quiet parking in an area between Sierra de Bejar and Sierra de Gata. Visit theme park and taste hornazos and cheap Iberian products

title: (37671) San Esteban de la Sierra - 20 Camino el Salto
title_short: (37671) San Esteban de la Sierra - 20 Camino el Salto
description: Excellent place to sleep. On the outskirts of town with wonderful views. Village center two minutes away with bars, restaurant and shops where you can buy everything. The place does not have services to recharge light or water or for emptying, but sleeping is wonderful. Highly recommended.

title: (10740) Aldeanueva del Camino - 11 Calle Gabriel y Galán
title_short: (10740) Aldeanueva del Camino - 11 Calle Gabriel y Galán
description: Level parking next to the road. I imagine you can sleep but it must be noisy. Dulces Inés bakery is worth a visit. Homemade buns, hornazo ... There are also several paprika factories. From the town there is a small route to the Pozo Hondo

title: (37724) Lagunilla - C. Emigrante
description: Well with good spring water on the street, parking lot opposite. 2 tubes where you can fill canisters or a watering can. No hose connection. The locals also use the water.

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 Carretera Ávila
description: Paid parking. Perfect to start excursions to the pylons or the bridges. Recently built, so it does not correspond to what is seen in the satellite view.

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 N-110
description: Paid parking.

title: (10749) Cabezuela del Valle - CC-102
description: Nice place to rest and watch the sunset. Next to the road but very few cars pass by. There is no shadow.

name: Camping Bungalow Valle del Jerte
title: (10612) Camping Bungalow Valle del Jerte
description: Campsite next to the Jerte river. Very close to the Hell's Throat. Many routes to visit the Jerte valley. Expensive for what it offers. Lots of shade, as it has very tall trees. This is a problem for large motorhomes. Be careful not to rub the branches during maneuvers. Good pool with grass. It is in a privileged environment a few meters from the Garganta de los Infierno. The discharge area has only one faucet which should be used to charge the water and clean the toilet

title: (10749) Gargantilla - Calle Jerte
description: At the edge of a natural pool, only van, narrow street

title: (05620) La Carrera - Unnamed Road
description: Area with picnic area, bathroom and shadows. With chiringuito in the summer months. Night prohibited in the national park.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 12D Diseminado Carretera
description: Free field next to Jerte. From there you can go out to do the many routes and trails with incredible views. Remember to bring a swimsuit in case you are brave and take a bath in one of the natural swamps. There are numerous bars nearby (when I went there was only 1 open) and a supermarket. The quiet night. There is little traffic of cars that go to farms in the mountains. It is also a place where people go for a walk. There are two garbage cans at the junction to the road, so you have no excuses to leave it dirty ☺️

title: (10612) Cabezuela del Valle - 12 N-110
description: Gande esplanade in gravel visible from the road (it is necessary to take the bridge). Nothing exceptional but it allows to be much more quiet and less roadside than the camping area because located at the entrance of "Garganta de los infiernos". There is room to mail the dogs. Peaceful night before the ballad in the gorges.

title: (05697) Navatejares - 18 Calle Fuente Cabezas Altas
description: Quiet place to spend the night in nature, parking the beginning of the road Galin Gómez Lagoon or also known as Laguna del Barco place.

title: (10749) Cabezuela del Valle - CC-102
description:
Amazing and freezing. Totally beautiful mountain top desolate car park with insane views. No bins or water but a few picnic tables and hiking paths. Dead silence at night
 apart from some nightbird calls. Very windy and cold(october) be warned !

title: (37670) Santibáñez de la Sierra - Calle Pedragal
title_short: (37670) Santibáñez de la Sierra - Calle Pedragal
description: At the height of El Pipero restaurant visible from the road (local cuisine) is behind the building, and public access although it is a private property of the restaurant, a natural water and green space. Saving place and very pleasant by strong heat. The happiness of children. No picnic possible otherwise have lunch at the restaurant.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 2 Calle Filiberto Villalobos
description: Parking trucks but they allow you to park without problems, monitored 24h. And bar for breakfast a good toast with good ham at a good price.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 370 Carretera Ávila
description:
Drinking water point with thread at Repsol petrol station.
Friendly owners and clean toilets.
Minimarket with bread and gas bottles.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle -
description: Siding along the road with a lot of shade, tables and swings. 10 minutes walk from the natural pool of Cabezuela. There is a source of drinking water with a tap, with a long hose the tank could be filled. Just past the town of Cabezuela del Valle towards Ávila on the right after a bend. To eat in summer cool and pleasant. We have not slept but all the cars on the road will be heard.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 6d Calle Bajada de las Piscinas
title_short: (37770) Guijuelo - 6d Calle Bajada de las Piscinas
description: Large parking lot at the sports center, very quiet night, the truck parking lot scared us for waking up

title: (37768) Fuenterroble de Salvatierra - SA-212
description: This is a very weird place! It is the beginnings of an industrial estate but there are no buildings yet so it is completely empty and deserted. It has nice views and is useful if you want a quiet place to have a snooze. No shade, no water and not beautiful but has a function!

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - N-110
description: Parking next to the Cabezuela ot. 2 places in the shade. beautiful natural pools. peaceful place

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 4 Paraje Vadillo
description: Parking of the natural pools, full day at night it remains empty quiet and pleasant place

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle -
description: Beautiful place to rest

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 5 Paraje Vadillo
description: Chiringuito parking, good for spending the night in winter because it is closed, in summer I imagine it will be full of cars and noise from the party. 20 meters from natural pools and 5m walk from the town. Ideal for campers, there is a park next door for children

title: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - AV-P-537
description: Small corner of the river with 0kage of sand. it cannot be reached by vehicle but a 1-minute walk away. space for vehicles of all types with a dirt road. no shade but the river is perfect!

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 19 Calle Cahoz
description: Roadside parking near natural pool and village

title: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - 7 Calle de la Alameda
title_short: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - 7 Calle de la Alameda
description: It is a parking lot located inside the village of Avila next to the Tormes River, the standard parking lot, but next to some picnic areas and children's playground with a walk along the river. It is a quiet place and there is a source of drinking water.

title: (37657) Sotoserrano - Unnamed Road
description: Necessary 4x4, be careful with the height of the trees, Max 2m, very discreet and without discomfort, let's leave the environment as we found it

title: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - Paseo de la Muralla
title_short: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - Paseo de la Muralla
description: Parking lot assigned to Barco de Ávila Castle. Very quiet area with a magnificent view of Gredos and the Tormes river. No parking problem except Monday morning when there is a rake and there are plenty of cars until noon. Try the beans and scrambled legs

title: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - 9B Calle Pedro de Lagasca
title_short: (05600) El Barco de Ávila - 9B Calle Pedro de Lagasca
description: Large parking within the urban center, at least now, January 2020 there was not a single vehicle. We have spent the night without hearing anything. Very quiet and central. Our 7.45 meter ac without access problem. Some bars nearby, shops, bank , pharmacy ... For the day we have left and visited this small but beautiful town.

name: Camping Vega de Francia
title: (37657) Camping Vega de Francia
description: Vega de Francia campsite near Sotoserrano beach. It has complete facilities, spacious and modern, with green and very shady areas for camping.

title: (37774) Guijo de Ávila - Unnamed Road
description: Parking spot. total calm. wonderful starry sky. right in front of a no longer existing campsite.

title: (05697) Nava del Barco -
description: Next to the bridge there is a flat space where I have slept 2 nights without any problem. It is accessed by a path that is largely made of cement. From there the route to the Laguna de la Nava starts.

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 3 Urbanizacion Caja Ahorros
title_short: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle - 3 Urbanizacion Caja Ahorros
description: Parking next to a beach bar and a river pool. 5 minutes from the bar area, the town center and the cherry museum ( which is worth it).

title: (10610) Cabezuela del Valle -
description: Place in the town where 3 vans fit. Next to the river.

title: (37657) Sotoserrano -
description: Perfect place to spend the night in the middle of nature, at the foot of the river, easy access by van

title: (05697) Nava del Barco - Calle Corral
description: Nava de Barco stellar viewpoint car park, starting point of the PR-AV39 (Laguna de Nava), does not have any service, but perfect overnight stay.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 21 Calle Teso de la Feria
title_short: (37770) Guijuelo - 21 Calle Teso de la Feria
description: Quiet place to spend the day. Flat and without services.

name: Camping El Burro Blanco
title: (37660) Camping El Burro Blanco
description: The campsite is a dream location for those looking for nature in pure PUR without frills. In the middle of the national park, it is wonderfully natural in the middle of the forest. Beware: this place is actually only suitable for tents or small campers. For large campers, this is very little space.

title: (10748) Abadía - Calle Carretera
description: River pool. A large car park and a bar with good tapas.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 4 SA-104
description: Parking at the edge of a lake, located in the middle of a bend in a road with few passages. Ideal for a stopover, possibility of spending the night there. Very nice view of the lake.

title: (37660) Miranda del Castañar - 31 Calle Corta
description: A neighbor confirms that this area has been activated by the town hall for motorhomes, it is in halt with beautiful views, grassy land but good for parking. Before getting on this site, there is a parking lot but rather usable for vehicles that still park motorhomes, but the parking indicator with an arrow and the motorhome sign refers to this place as we informed the neighbor.

title: (37660) Miranda del Castañar - 1 Calle Corta
description: Spacious plot and ideal parking for the night and visit the beautiful village or the beautiful hiking trails.

title: (37660) Miranda del Castañar - 21 Avenida Constitución
description: Parking at the entrance of the town of Miranda del Castañar. It is a land of rammed earth and with olive trees. You can sleep but it is only suitable for vans since the trees are low. Without services, just after passing the Health Center and another car park that is valid for motorhomes.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 39 Avenida del Pilar
description: Small car park at the confluence of two rivers. Very pretty situation and quiet apart from the river. Room for one motor home. No services.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - N-630
description: Iberfuel gas station, in the industrial area, with cheap diesel.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 2 Calle Rio Huebra
description: Quiet place for several campers nearby. Edge of an industrial estate. Beautiful view of the mountains.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 120-134 Avenida de Extremadura
description: On the banks of the Jerte River. Next to the LUN bar, where you eat well and cheaply. Very close to the Gorge de le Nogaleras.

title: (10739) Segura de Toro - CC-58
description: Natural pool. Bull safe.

title: (37770) Guijuelo - 2 Calle I
description: We have only stopped to eat, but it is a quiet place and you could sleep without problem.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 45 Calle Juan Azabal
description: Level and large parking, ideal when the area is saturated, you can sleep without problems

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 6 Calle Cerro Real
description: Large quiet parking next to the river Jerte.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 28 Calle Cerro Real
description: Very quiet day and night parking next to the Jerte river and next to plaza de los toros, some trees if it is not busy good place to park

title: (05690) Los Llanos de Tormes - 97-75 Calle Cruz
title_short: (05690) Los Llanos de Tormes - 97-75 Calle Cruz
description: Small recreational area with benches and tables. very close to the river Tormes for activities.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 34c Paseo Río Jerte
description: Parking anxiety right next to the river certainly very quiet, ideal to see the city and if it was necessary to spend the night.

title: (05692) El Barquillo - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful esplanade to spend the day by the river and spend the night in the middle of nature, always respecting nature

title: (37770) Guijuelo - A-66
description: Picnic area, without shade.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 3C Paraje Molino la Rana
description: Ample parking, with a playground and nearby bars (snacks, hamburgers,...). Good option if the area is crowded.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 5A Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Parking next to the municipal sports center, quite wide where they fit where they could park 10 or 15 AC or vans. There is a motorhome area but since it is full, we come here, I think there is no problem staying overnight. Quite a few garbage cans right here.

title: (37660) Miranda del Castañar - 5 SA-225
description: A small parking lot next to the road, in front there is a games room. Ideal for eating and resting.

title: (05696) San Lorenzo de Tormes - 18 Plaza de las Lavaderos
title_short: (05696) San Lorenzo de Tormes - 18 Plaza de las Lavaderos
description: Asphalted parking without services overlooking the Sierra de Gredos. entrance stuck by the side of the bar.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 32 Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Beautiful place next to the natural pool and you can reach in a few minutes walk Navaconcejo.

title: (37657) Sotoserrano - 19 SA-225
description: Access road suitable for motorhomes with caution, level terrain. Quiet and lonely place. No services. Leave the place as you found it.

title: (10613) Navaconcejo - 54 Carretera Nacional 110 Diseminado
description: Near the river, very quiet night

title: (37657) Sotoserrano - 19 SA-225
description: Nice place on the river. Plenty of room.

name: Parking La Bardera
title: (37748) Parking La Bardera
description: Very quiet place by the river. The owner of the beach bar lets you spend the night on an esplanade that you do not use. There are clean bathrooms.

name: Camping Bungalows Rio Jerte
title: (10613) Camping Bungalows Rio Jerte
description: Navaconcejo, 46 ​​N-110. Camping with many facilities, paddle tennis, tennis, gym, swimming pool and natural pool, wifi throughout the campsite. Bar and restaurant. summer activity monitors. Etc ..

title: (37658) Garcibuey - 9 Lugar Extrarradio
description: Parking to visit the town of Garcibuey and see its graffiti murals. It does not have services but a couple of motorhomes can enter. It is advisable not to enter the town with ACs.

title: (37760) Linares de Riofrío - Unnamed Road
description: Pitcher Fountain. Place where you can replenish water, there are also a couple of tables

title: (37748) Puente del Congosto - 6T Calle Prosperidad
description: Quiet place with grass floor with a park on the premises. there are benches to sit on. at the foot of the river

title: (10711) La Granja - EX-205
description: Parking next to a beach bar. Places for a 10 motorhomes. Ideal to take a dip and eat fresh at the beach bar.

title: (10711) La Granja - 3 Fuente
description: Parking rest area, Great if you are traveling on the A66.I have stayed a night and have had no problems. In the Summer the area is used as a swimming pool for the locals

title: (37656) Cepeda - 2D Avenida del Pocito
description: In the town there are all the services and very friendly people

title: (37656) Cepeda - 16B Avenida Reyes Catolicos
description: Parking without services. Very quiet night. Nice town for a walk. Recommended hiking trails through the forest. Playground, picnic tables and restaurant bar with terrace across the road.

title: (05697) Navalonguilla - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the edge of the Garganta de los Caballeros. Very spacious, free, with possible shade, picnic tables, containers, beach bar-restaurant. The landscape is spectacular and the puddle in the wonderful river, although frozen and very crowded on summer weekends. Total tranquility for the night.

title: (37656) Cepeda - 8A Carretera Salamanca
description: Ample parking and overnight on the outskirts of Cepeda. The town is beautiful and has everything. Peaceful place. Cement floor

title: (37658) Villanueva del Conde - 24-26 Plaza das Eras
title_short: (37658) Villanueva del Conde - 24-26 Plaza das Eras
description: People with charm, unique, surrounded by nature

name: Restaurant Camping La Guilera
title: (05697) Restaurant Camping La Guilera
description: Camping La Guilera

title: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes - Camino de La Aceña
title_short: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes - Camino de La Aceña
description: Entry of the dirt road, with 7,5 meters motorhome with Portamotos, the site is at the edge of the lake, beautiful, calm and if you like nature, it is worth despite the road

title: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes -
description: Nice place right next to the lake. The pitch offers shade from the side and shelter from strong winds due to the low trees. wThis keeps it from getting too hot and the PV can still generate electricity. It's very lonely at the site as most drive to the nearby picnic area. Overnight stays accepted and maximum 2-3 cars per day (08/19 on a Saturday). Also very easy to get to. Note: Do not use the first driveway, as the driveway here is very steep and you will definitely land (unless you are off-road). Use the second entrance and keep left (see maps; very easy to spot). For longer vehicles it could be a little sloping. My vehicle: 7m longer and 3m high (long wheelbase). Please take your paces or similar with you and leave the place clean!

title: (10730) Casas del Monte - Calle Caballero
description: Place surrounded by nature and natural pools very close, with very refreshing water. Perfect for spending the night and sleeping peacefully

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo -
description: On the banks of the Meandro de Melero. We spent a super quiet night. Privileged sky to see stars. There are olive trees at the entrance that overlook the roof of the van.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo -
description: Beautiful spot in nature. Moderate access by van or 4x4, not with motor homes!. Drive until the end of the gravel road!Check the water level in the river before you drive to this spot. Possibilities to turn your car/van once on the spot. Not sure if you are allowed to spend the night on this spot, though the little chance that they will notice you stay here. It’s on a walking track, so it’s possible you’ll meet some hikers.

title: (10624) Caminomorisco -
description: Melero  Meander. A passage to sleep right by the river where the meander passes.

title: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes - Unnamed Road
description: Another possibility to land on the edge of the water reservoir. It's not quite flat. No shade, often wind.

title: (37610) Mogarraz - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice place, we did not do night and no photos because we discovered it at night. It is about a kilometer from Mogarraz, it is very quiet and has fairly level areas.

title: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes - Unnamed road
description: On the edge of a magnificent lake, no service, but a magnificent place for the night or the day with the possibility of swimming.

title: (37760) Linares de Riofrío - 27 Calle Cerca
description: Quiet parking, in slope, essential shims. ideal to know the Sierra de Las Quilamas, climb the peak Cervero, and the forest of La Honfria. Lovely in autumn

name: Piscina Natural Villanueva del Conde
title: (37658) Piscina Natural Villanueva del Conde
description: Leaving the main road you enter a service road where you can park motorhomes and stay overnight. A quiet and spectacular place. In the surroundings there are several paths. The people at the beach bar are very nice with good pinchos. Possibility of roasting your own meat.

address.street: Camino al Charco de la Cruz

title: (37650) Sequeros - 35 Calle de Estella
description: Parking very small but very nice and comfortable, surrounded by nature trails and hiking.

title: (37779) Aldeavieja de Tormes - 1 Camino Cementerio
description: Next to the Santa Teresa Reservoir. Wooded area, wide, next to the Reservoir. Without any service, but very close to the town of Aldeavieja de Tormes

title: (37610) -
description: The town is small, the 3 car parks are for cars, one of them is private, a hotel restaurant. At the exit of the town, just 2 meters away, there is on the left bank towards San Martín del Castañar, a large area for up to 4 AC, ours is 7.20 meters. Without a problem, the place deserves to lose you.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo -
description: Water point, with hose. If a tall vehicle you may not be able to get very close because there is a parking cover but the hose is quite long.

title: (37650) Sequeros - 11 Paseo Virgen del Robledo
description: New parking on the outskirts of the town of Sequeros, well leveled, it is both for cars and AC, there are no services but in the hermitage there is a fountain with a tap to be able to load drinking water.

name: Finca La Peregrina
title: (10459) Finca La Peregrina
description: Private parking in LA PEREGRINA farm for AC and Campers. Cozy place in the middle of nature 50 meters from the Jaranda gorge.

title: (37619) Monforte de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
title_short: (37619) Monforte de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area by the Mirador de Madonal, plenty of spaces and a lovely view. Small walking area and benches to sit

title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara -
description: Large public car park in Charco de La Maquina. It is not a place adapted for overnight, however, there are vans that stay. The place is wonderful, next to the river, quiet, and you can take a bath in the pool, crystal clear water with a very cozy little waterfall. It is right next to the Private Area for AC, but if you do not need to empty or fill, this place is a good option. The downside is that there are almost no level gaps. But the setting is worth it. In Guijo you can also do the Charco del Trabuquete route. Wonderful waterfall and place.

title: (05690) Navamojada -
description: Access only for 4x4 next to the river in a private estate accessed by a public road in poor condition only suitable for 4x4

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 13A Calle Escuelas
description: Apartment next to the river beach, a lot of tree. Quiet. We spent the day about 7 cars and camper. You are on the same beach of the river, on the other side of the Riomalo campsite.

title: (37760) Linares de Riofrío - Unnamed Road
description: Very peaceful, with tables, bbq area and water ( only a dribble when we went in April. ) you could probably spend the night but the ground is sloping gently.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 1 Diseminado Riomalo
description: Small grass esplanade to visit the meander.

title: (10624) Riomalo de Abajo - 13A Calle Escuelas
description: Parking trees of the village on the banks of the river in the street that goes to the campsite. Very quiet place, shadows, and good start to the meander route. We were at the end of October so quiet. We slept 3 vans and the next day we left there 1 caravan. 2 bars at 50 meters.

name: Mirasierra
title: (37610) Mirasierra
description: Private car park of the Mirasierra restaurant. Although it is only for customers, it is worth eating at the restaurant before or after visiting this beautiful city. The parking lot is small, but the restaurant has, a little further down, another large parking lot which must be opened only at the request of customers. Try your luck, the city is worth it.

name: Camping Riomalo
title: (10624) Camping Riomalo
description: Camping next to the natural pool. Cozy place, each plot has its own sink with drinking water, own bar and another one outside. price good. For small campers yes. Otherwise mostly permanent campers. People very nice. very narrow. below nice meadow for camping.

title: (10615) Piornal - Unnamed Road
description: Location for cars and vans, unlimited height with good panoramic views, to admire the sunset, possibility to go cycling ... Etc. .. There is no shade, no services, it is accessible by a rural road. Road in good condition

title: (10624) Caminomorisco - Unnamed Road
description: New esplanade where you can park and spend the night without any problem, with spectacular views And perfect to turn around Motorhomes, since the site is quite large. Capacity for enough cars and motorhomes, highly recommended site

title: (37610) Mogarraz - 2-4 Calle los Castillos
description: Public parking next to the bus stop. Large enough for motorhomes but without services. Asphalted. Good place to visit the town.

title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 7 Plaza Corredores
title_short: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 7 Plaza Corredores
description: Parking at the entrance of the town with the possibility of hiking in both summer and winter, rustic village and own Extremadura cuisine. The P for AC is that of the 3rd photo, next to the house of culture. There the path begins.

title: (37659) Mogarraz - Unnamed Road
description: In the heart of the Sierra de Francia, next to the road. There are tables and benches. The Francia river runs through. There were people bathing.

title: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 16 Carretera de Jarandilla
title_short: (10459) Guijo de Santa Bárbara - 16 Carretera de Jarandilla
description: Asphalt parking with views of the valley. Very close to the center of town. The parking is allowed to capers and AC. Level, but without any service. Only garbage.

title: (37779) Salvatierra de Tormes - 3 Calle San Juan
title_short: (37779) Salvatierra de Tormes - 3 Calle San Juan
description: Free parking at the foot of the castle. Village of 75 inhabitants with history. Spectacular view of the lake. Good restaurant at the rural hotel.
